about_the_game:
SiNKR 2 is a minimalist puzzle game evolved from the award winning SiNKR. There is just you, hooks, pucks, and various contraptions. SiNKR 2 employs familiar contraptions (square and round holes, kickers, and portals) in new layouts, e.g. spirals; linear and rotational symmetry.

Subtle differences within level themes drive different solutions to superficially similar scenarios.

Carried over from SiNKR

  • Tutorial levels (no SiNKR experience needed)
  • Advanced levels allow for multiple solutions
  • No scores, no timers, no distractions
  • Responsive ambient soundscape
  • No text, suitable for all languages

Improved flow through the game

  • Mini-map level selector with challenge ratings from * to ***
  • Multiple paths to complete the game
  • Skippable levels



Playtime 3.5 hours (speedy) to 4.5 hours (relaxed). Thanks for playing and have fun!
